title: Stay Together
lyrics:
[Intro: Jaheim, 
Ledisi
]
You know I love you, right? (
Love you, too
)
Ain't nobody got what we got (
No, no
)
(
Whatever you and I, baby
) Ooh
Yeah, this, this here built from the concrete, baby
It don't get no better than this (
Ooh, no no
)
Yeah yeah
[Verse 1: Jaheim, 
Ledisi
]
We had some ups and downs (Ups and downs)
Made a lot of bad mistakes (Bad mistakes)
But we've always had some good times
And through it all
You've held me down
Baby, you've always held it down
Oh yeah
There were times when I was afraid
And wanted you to leave
But you stayed right here by my side
You never let me go
You always stayed around
(That's right)
You stayed around
(And you've been so good to me)
[Chorus: Ledisi, 
Jaheim
]
And it doesn't matter
I know whatever comes our way
You know, you and me, we gonna stay, together (
Together
)
Baby, we've been through so much
Our love is so strong, you know, (
You know I know
)
You and me, we gonna stay, together, oh yeah (
My baby
)
[Verse 2: Ledisi, 
Jaheim
, 
Both
]
We know each other so well
You always seemed to tell
When I need a little kiss and a hug
And that extra kind of loving
You love me like a champion
Baby, you're my Superman, yeah, yeah (
Baby
)
Girl, you know just what I like
What you do, it makes me lose my mind
 (Oh yeah)
I just wanna give to you
 (Give you), 
make love to you
 (Love to you)
Take you and a put you on a rocket, fly
Keep on lovin'
 
'til we touch the sky
 (Whoa, ooh)
'Til we touch the sky
 ('Til we touch the sky)
Baby, baby, baby
[Chorus: Ledisi, 
Jaheim
, 
Both
]
And it doesn't matter
I know whatever comes our way
You know (
You know
), you and me (
We gon'
), stay (
Stay
), together
(We gon' stay together)
Baby, we've been through so much
Our love is so strong, you know
You and me, we gonna stay
, together
(We gon' stay together, oh yeah)
[Outro: Ledisi, 
Jaheim
, 
Both
]
I love you (
I love you, too
)
You mean the world to me, and I ain't ever leavin'
I ain't ever leavin'
We gon' stay together, yeah, ooh ooh yeah (
Yeah, yeah
)
Baby, we gon' stay together
Baby, we gon' stay together
Your love, my love, our love, we gon' stay together
(Together) (
Together, together
)
Your love, my love, our love, we gon' stay together
Girl, we gon' stay together
We gon' stay, we gon' stay together, together
